Reviews.Title: “Clean & nice for the price”
Reviews.Author: SilverFang13
Reviews.Content: hotel del comte nice clean friendly staff english close metro station urgell hairdryer tv computer internet lobby free mirror bathroom expensive breakfast 11 euro thin wallsdoors hear people talk flush toilet 20min walking distance la rambla

Reviews.Title: “Lovely!”
Reviews.Author: lavajonation
Reviews.Content: location hotel absolutely brilliant especially airport bus sightseeing extremely central lots cafes restaurants environs lovely clean staff incredibly helpful free wifi icing cake definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean and nice for the price”
Reviews.Author: Craiger S
Reviews.Content: clean staff friendly spent 3 nights complaints little price couldnt hotel short walking distance major avoid street noise looking clean stay fair price cant wrong hotel del comte

Reviews.Title: “VERY RUDE & PICTURES ARE SOOOOO DIFFERENT THAN THE REALITY”
Reviews.Author: jasmin e Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights nightmares didnt sleep walls thin hear guests staff impolite smoking floor reeked smoke people smoking hallways bathroom noise night noise fights screams hotel change day refused complained reception boss office screamed dont leave payed upfront money refused telling leave rude didnt privacy stay cleaning staff noise morning disturb sign door knocked clean terrible experience return

Reviews.Title: “Faultless really and good value”
Reviews.Author: merila t
Reviews.Content: spent night happily stayed hotel located easy walking distance likes rambla avoid elements main tourist strip spotlessly clean nice style feels official 2 star ranking didn’t view blissfully quiet

Reviews.Title: “Great location for the price”
Reviews.Author: G K
Reviews.Content: paid reasonable price stay midweek hotel location heart barcelonas gay district lots friendly local bars restaurants scattered hotel urgell metro station 5 minute walk little uncomfortable bed comfortable bathroom fine clean reasonably maintained breakfast decent

Reviews.Title: “Del Comte Hotel”
Reviews.Author: daniloeale
Reviews.Content: wife friends spent days del comte hotel november 2011 visited barcelona perfect location hotel situated five minutes walk metro bus aerobus station twenty minutes walk plaza de rambla accommodation perfect spotlessly clean comfortable delicious breakfast i’ll stay del comte hotel barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: ckblah
Reviews.Content: hotel thats convenient located quiet located near urgell metro station clean airy wifi available freeofcharge signal relatively weak staff extremely helpful friendly cafes supermarket nearby breakfast offered selection pastries lacklustre airport aerobus takes passengers urgell metro station alight walk convenient leaving middle night bus near urgell station reach airport cheap t10 bus

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay, very good for 2 star”
Reviews.Author: Eagle10_6
Reviews.Content: 15 minutes walk city centre location fairly transport links close standard bus airport stops 15 minutes walk connecting tube service stops round corner advice front desk main restaurants fairly facilities 2 star free computer internet connection available time breakfast expensive nearby venues

Reviews.Title: “A quick view”
Reviews.Author: Matthew-Melas
Reviews.Content: 3 nights barcelona stay comte hotel pleasant centered breakfast clean hotel maybe soundproof poor matters lot day

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: navigator_th
Reviews.Content: happy stay hotel location perfect block metro station aero bus stop airport 2 blocks aero bus stop airport supermarket door own breakfast lunch cheaply easily nice restaurants choices choose nice modern clean heater free wifi bathroom beautiful clean love window lock didnt hear noise road sleep wall thin heard teenagers hung heard people walked hall floor staffs helpful explained helped print boarding pass value cheap price definitely stay hotel barcelona strongly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good and cheap”
Reviews.Author: traxstar
Reviews.Content: positive hotel placed 1520min walking la rambla close metro corner urgell staff nice helpful talked english clean tv watch soccer matches computer internet free hairdryer negative didnt fridgerator clock mirror wall bathroom people talking flush toilet breakfast 11euro expensive didnt alot offer

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfy, good location, some internal noise”
Reviews.Author: chrissie2689
Reviews.Content: double looking onto flat roof comfortable reasonable size bathroom lovely walkin shower day cleaned immaculately traffic noise location metro buses wardrobe otherwise minimalist clock mini bar kettle tubes shower gel provided breakfast expensive dont eat hotel cafe round corner cooked stiflingly hot time adjust lower wooden floors amplified corridoor noise walls thin sleep morning interruption cleaners staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “Central, comfortable, good price”
Reviews.Author: cbhomework
Reviews.Content: upside hotel location corner urgell metro station line 1 exit metro station comte metres walk alternatively walking central placa catalunya supermarkets nearby didnt breakfast hotel priced 8euro plus tax person coffee shops couple restaurants street ones parallel clean showerbath using safe internet free charge receptionist available 24hr negative comment neighbour decides bathshower time easily hear water gushing shower head sound actually woke twice middle night

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel but noisy laminate flooring”
Reviews.Author: neilgScotland
Reviews.Content: stayed recently 4 nights news reception staff wonderful price £40 night free internet reception clean modern looking free safe slim tv 1 english channel sky news constantly loops adverts location handy tube station prefer little nearer action closer playa de catalunya didnt try breakfast cant comment local cafe boqueria market bad news teacoffee facilities hallways laminate flooring walk thinking looks nice modern nights sleep constantly woken noise suitcase wheels rolling floor people check stayed 4 nights tried ear plugs avail shouldnt shame 5 stars recommended staying nights sleep oh bit beige carpet sorry sounds harsh

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel - great location”
Reviews.Author: Seraphimo
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel del comte march 2 march 5 2010 visiting spain time spouse decided choose hotel del comte due location connect airport taking aerobus a1 airport stops urgell metro hotel block walk del comte airport stop 2 blocks south sepulveda euro 5 person trip buses frequent running depending time day truly situated central barcelona central metro urgell red line lgbt friends 23 blocks gay eixample party night walk hotel hotel 215 street facing hotel bit noisy traffic windows noise comfortable clean closet space 2 bathroom walk shower hot water bedside clocks norm european hotel bring travel watch provide shampoobody gel combo tube own brand bring bed mattress opinion firm mattress safe valuables storage concerned safe lock bag bit noisy neighbor hear tour staying floor noisy nights hotel breakfast buffet euro 9 skip grab breakfast tapas joints supermarket below hotel called dia market cheap hear buy bottled water spent euro 5 2 people breakfast overall stay hotel barcelona fabulous visit
